definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: 103:a. [[בֶּזֶּוק]]: Nes:AJSL xiii (1897). 176 conj. mng. gravel, cf. mod. Ramle = sand.

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: — [[בֶּוֶק]]: err. in Ju Jdg 1:4, Jdg 1:5 (v. GFM).

definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: — I. [[[בָּחֵל]]]: Nö:ZAW xvii (1897), 188 disproves Syr. bh.iyl, and adopts the view of Gei:Urschrift 270 ([[בחל]] euphem. for a √ II. [[בעל]] = loathe, c. [[בְּ]], assumed (Thes Buhl) for Je 3:14, Je 31:32; v. infr. on p. 127a).
